description: Help a minion cross a busy road
name: crossy_road

components.text: Use the start flag to run scripts when the game starts
Make sprite start at the top
Make sprite face to the right

steps.description: make the sprite start at the top and face to the right
steps.title: Starting Position

components.text: Create a variable to store the score
Create a variable to check if the sprite has been hit

steps.description: Track the score with a variable
steps.title: Create Variables

components.text: To keep running code use a forever loop. In this loop check if keys are pressed

components.blocks:
if <key [right arrow] pressed?> then
	change x by (10)
end
components.text: If the right arrow key pressed. Make sprite move to the right

components.blocks:
if <key [left arrow] pressed?> then
	change x by (-10)
end
components.text: If the left arrow key pressed. Make sprite move to the left

components.blocks:
if <key [up arrow] pressed?> then
	change y by (10)
end
components.text: If the up arrow key pressed. Make sprite move to the up

components.blocks:
if <key [down arrow] pressed?> then
	change y by (-10)
end
components.text: If the down arrow key pressed. Make sprite move to the down

steps.description: Make your minion move across the road. Check which keys are pressed within a forever loop
steps.title: Player Movement

components.blocks:
if <touching [edge]?> then
	hide
	change x by (-440)
	show
end
components.text: When your sprite hits an edge. Move to the far left of the stage

steps.description: Make the cars drive along the road. When the cars reach the end of the road make them reset position
steps.title: Moving the Cars

components.text: Check if hitting a sprite. Set the hit variable to 1

components.blocks:
define reset
go to x: (0) y: (150)
set [hit] to (0)
set [score] to (0)
components.text: When the game is over reset the position of the sprite. Use this code to also reset variables
If hit is 1 then reset the sprite

steps.description: Add scripts to the car to check if the car is hitting your minion. When any car hits the minion set the hit to 1 and seset the minion when hit is 1
steps.title: Hitting Car

components.blocks:
if <touching color [#006622]?> then
	change [Score] by [1]
	reset
end
components.text: If the sprite reaches the other side. Increase the score and reset

steps.description: If the player reaches the other side then score a point
steps.title: Scoring Points

title: Crossy Road
